channel.title: [Glitch] Broken Vortigaunt models
channel.description:
On the return trip through Power Up, coming out of the Silo towards the Rail Hub, I ran into a collection of Vortigaunt ragdolls. All of them were stuck in the same position and I was unable to interact with them.
![vort_glitch.jpg|690x500](upload://uUtFVW6CqN4OS89p83BJlhwGaK1.jpeg)
map : bm_c2a1a at: -29 x, 1127 y, -159 z setpos -29.434105 1127.630615 -159.968750;setang 3.066242 157.377777 0.000000

item.title: [Glitch] Broken Vortigaunt models
item.dc:creator: JohannesWiberg
item.description:
I have this same issue - ALL the time during the game. Virtually all vortigaunts have done this in some fashion, and some sequences (like the vortigaunts coming up the slope when you have a turret gun) are completely broken, ruining the gameplay completely.
I’m a big Black Mesa fan but this really detracts a LOT from the game. I played the game when the free version came out, and I’ve bought it now on Steam and am playing it again. Generally there are big improvements, but this bug feels really unprofessional, I’m sorry to say.

item.description:
This isn’t just occurring with Vortigaunts. I experienced it while playing Lambda Core, where the ragdolls of almost all previously killed enemies (vorts, zombies and houndeyes) were in this position (and some HECU earlier on). Probably a bug in the most recent patch.
